cart_shipping_note: Shipping and taxes calculated at checkout.
collection_desc_warm_blanket: After-dark essentials. Sleepwear that doesn't compromise on edge.
collection_desc_lazy: Off-duty uniform. Heavyweight layers built for doing nothing — and looking good at it.
product_desc_cloud_pyjama_set: Brushed cotton set, relaxed cut. Button-front top, elastic-waist bottoms. Soft but not soft.
product_desc_dream_wrap_robe: Heavy fleece robe, oversized shawl collar, deep pockets. Throw it on and don't look back.
product_desc_sleepy_head_shorts: Modal-blend sleep shorts. Lightweight, breathable. Layer them or wear them solo.
product_desc_midnight_slip_top: Silk cami with lace detailing. Clean lines, quiet luxury.
product_desc_cloud_nine_socks: Crew socks with non-slip grip. Heavyweight knit, built for all-night comfort.
product_desc_all_day_hoodie: Heavyweight French terry, dropped shoulders. Kangaroo pocket holds everything you need.
product_desc_sunday_sweats: Tapered joggers, brushed fleece inside, smooth outside. Elastic waist, ribbed cuffs. No plans necessary.
product_desc_nap_champion_tee: Oversized garment-dyed tee. Pre-shrunk cotton that holds its shape.
product_desc_couch_crew_sweatshirt: Classic crewneck, raglan sleeves. Midweight fleece — layers or stands alone.
product_desc_drift_off_shorts: French terry shorts, 7-inch inseam, drawstring waist. Street to couch and back.
product_desc_moonlight_matching_set: Satin-trimmed jersey set. Long-sleeve henley, tapered pants. Low-key elegance.
product_desc_starry_night_set: Printed cotton voile. Camp-collar top, drawstring shorts. Light as a late-night breeze.
product_desc_velvet_dream_set: Stretch velour — cropped pullover, wide-leg pants. Heavy drape, minimal effort.
product_desc_lullaby_sleep_tee: Bamboo-cotton blend. Breathable, thermoregulating. Hits different against bare skin.
product_desc_twilight_tank: Ribbed modal tank, scalloped hem. Minimal construction, maximum range.
product_desc_hush_wrap_top: Washed silk wrap top. Adjustable tie closure. Fits how you want it to.
product_desc_starlight_sleep_pants: Full-length brushed cotton. Paper-bag waist, relaxed through the leg. Built for deep rest.
product_desc_dreamer_leggings: Modal-spandex second skin. Bed to mat without a wardrobe change.
product_desc_luna_lounge_shorts: High-waisted French terry, scalloped hem. A cut above the basics.
product_desc_cashmere_cocoon_cardigan: Oversized cashmere-wool blend, open front. Wraps like a blanket, wears like a statement.
product_desc_morning_mist_kimono: Lightweight chiffon kimono. Watercolour panels. The kind of piece that starts conversations.
product_desc_featherlight_duster: Ankle-length gauzy cotton. Dramatic silhouette, zero weight. Layers over everything.
product_desc_silk_eye_mask: Mulberry silk, adjustable band. Total blackout, zero pressure points.
product_desc_lavender_sleep_scrunchie: Silk scrunchies with dried lavender. Gentle hold, calming scent. Pack of three.
product_desc_bedside_slippers: Memory-foam base, shearling-lined. The first thing your feet deserve every morning.
product_desc_zip_up_chill_jacket: Full-zip French terry, stand collar, side pockets. The grab-and-go layer.
product_desc_oversized_pullover: Boxy fleece, dropped shoulders, ribbed cuffs. Intentionally two sizes up.
product_desc_weekend_tank: Slub cotton, raw-edge armholes. The official uniform of zero obligations.
product_desc_do_nothing_crop_tee: Cropped boxy heavyweight cotton. Pairs with every high-waisted bottom in the drop.
product_desc_snooze_logo_tee: Classic fit, embroidered logo detail. Ring-spun cotton that breaks in, not down.
product_desc_marathon_lounge_pants: Straight-leg brushed jersey. Internal drawcord, elastic waist. Built for the long haul.
product_desc_easy_wide_legs: Washed French terry, palazzo cut. Maximum drape, maximum comfort.
product_desc_lazy_beanie: Chunky rib-knit acrylic. One size, every mood.
product_desc_snooze_crew_socks: Cushioned crew socks, combed cotton, ribbed cuff. Three-pack in tonal colourways.
product_desc_blanket_scarf: Oversized brushed wool. Doubles as a throw. Big enough to share, too good to.
product_desc_lounge_slides: Cushioned terry-cloth footbed. Shower to sofa in one step.
